content: So @boats opened https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2958 which definitely seems worth mentioning here :)

i decided to close the RFC because im not willing to manage the RFC thread. there are a few serious challenges raised on the thread that would need to be addressed by anyone who picks it up again (clearly defining what it would mean in the context of unwinding, backwards incompatibility as it relates to async contexts' auto traits and state being persisted across destructor yields)
I was thinking it'd be good to summarize the key points raised

Hello, I'm new here. What's the status of async drop? Were there any progress made?

(I apologize if this isn't the proper place to ask)
@Elias Amaral not really, but do you have a need for it?
